1.content:
Race: Soul Slayer/ Hidden Vizard

Name: Ryan Akechi

Gender: Male

Facial Features: Resembles Tousen. Has a wider head and broader nose, black hair that comes over his eyes, and has blue eyes

Zampacto: Alastor

Shikai Release Phrase: Purify, Alastor

Shikai From: Completly white with black diamonds on the hilt.

Shikai Power: "Enlighten" Once stabbed with the blade, it gathers then fires the evil within the being. Works better with high level hollows.

Bankai Form: Long blade resembles a cutlass. Completely White. The hand guard is thin and has spikes moving toward the bottom of the grip.

Bankai power: "Shining light" gathers the surrounding spirit particles then releases them in a wave of light energy through the air.

Downside: It takes a long time to collect enough spirit particles to perform the attack at its fullest extent.

Bio: The proud captain of the 3rd squad. Ryan was once the 3rd seat and was promoted to captain soon after Aizen's rebellion. His upbeat attitude helped him win over Kira and most of the squad long before becoming captain. However his upbeat attitude is replaced with a fierce warrior on the battlefield. He sometimes tries to go into battle alone but usually he's followed by Kira.
1.title: Introducing Ryan Akechi

11.content:
The first day of being captain was pretty loose so far. I've been getting handshakes from everyone and they're all congratulating me on my new position. I was lounging in my quarters that night when Kira came in nervously. "We, as in the rest of the squad and I wanted to show you something.It's in the barracks." He said sheepishly. "Well this is unexpected. I'll be right there." I said.

About 15 minutes later I was walking down the path toward the barracks with my hands in my pocket. I could see the dim lights coming from the lanterns inside and hear the slight buzzing from within. "The whole squad must have been in there." I thought. Letting my mind wander off with the thought of exactly how many were inside. "Seventy-four, seventy-five, sevent...ow" I was cut off when I collided with the door.

Opening the door, i was forced to cover my eyes from a bright light. "SURPRISE CAPTAIN AKECHI!!" Wow, a surprise party for my first day as captain. "Awwww thanks guys." I said cheerfully. Almost immediately, i was passed some sake from one of my squad members. I accepted the cup and raised it high into the air. "To my squad" I said. "To our captain" They said also raising their cups. All then began drinking their sake including me. Most of us had more sake and more sake until almost everyone was passed out. I tried my best to walk back to my quarters. Several falls later i made it to my door. Opening it was exceedingly hard but i was able to do it. After i fell to the floor with a loud thud. "I gotta make it to my bed" i said in my head. So i started crawling. I finally pull myself onto my bed and passed out.

The next morning, I woke with a splitting headache. "Well that's what i get." i said aloud. Walking over to my desk i had seen a large number of papers. "Well thats gonna take awhile." I then walked over to my bathroom to wash my face. A few minutes later I was out and siting at my desk. I started reading then signing papers about the recent ruling, stating the captain-commander is going to take the place of Central Room 46, and that the captain-commander is going to stop chasing after Rukia.

Most of the day continued on like this. Reading then signing papers that had nothing to do the squad with random interjections from squad members. Most stating news I had already known. Until a hell butterfly came through my window. After landing on my finger i heard the captain-commander's voice. "There has been strange hollow activity in the human world. I'm sending your squad to deal with this." He said.

I then sent the hell butterfly away. After some searching through my pockets i was able to find a scroll. It held the incantation needed to summon a hell butterfly. After speaking what seemed to be gibberish a small black butterfly appeared on the back of my hand. I told the butterfly "Gather some of the new guys then meet me at the senkai gate at the edge of the courtyard." The butterfly seemed to know i wanted this message to go to Kira and it flew out the window and into the barracks.
11.title: First Day

111.content:
After looking at the butterfly fly away i rose from my desk, grabbing my katana and tieing it to my side. Leaving the papers behind Ryan casually walked out the door and into the hallway. The sound of his sandals hitting the floor filled the hallway with a slight echo. Eventually making it to the door i found it had been left halfway open. After fully opening the door i found there was no one in the central courtyard. Walking toward the barracks i see that door is partially open too. Using shunpo to get to the opening i was surprised to see what was inside. Nobody. "Where can they have gone" i said to myself. i stood there, rubbing my head, wondering where could they have all gone. Then the thought came to me "The training dojo!" i turned around and used shunpo to get to the across the court and into the dojo. Inside, i could see Kira and somebody else fighting with bokken. The rest of the squad was cheering them on. Kira was the first to notice me. Then his opponent, then others began to just stare at me. "Sorry to break up this session, but we got a mission. So get your katanas and get to the senkai gate." I said. Kira was the first to start walking toward the exit. Others got up and started walking out. Then many started running out. After the room cleared i used shunpo to get to the gate.

At the gate i noticed there where no guards. I looked to my left then to my right. No guards. Before I got the chance to search my squad came running towards me. "We're ready to go captain." Kira said. "Then lets" I responded. Turning to the gate, i remembered i didn't know how to open it. As if to read my thoughts the doors opened. After taking a deep breath, i walked in. Followed by my squad.

We walked into a very dark hallway. The only light was from the entrance and there was a green light on the far side. The strange thing was, the green light seemed to be coming faster then they were running. The light also seemed to be a beam rather than a doorway. I stopped dead in my tracks. "THATS A CERO!!" Kira yelled. The squad stopped in their tracks too. Ryan raised his hand to about chest level. He seemed prepared to catch the cero. The squad stepped back as the cero neared, its light brightening the path.

As the cero connected with Ryan's hand there was a shock wave and an even brighter light as the two conflicting powers met. The first few lines of squad members covered their eyes from this near blinding greenish, white light. Ryan then looked back at his men with a smile on his face. He then looked down at the cero which was shortening by the second. Ryan's pure white aura overtook the cero, turning it into a white ball in his hand. He pulled his arm back then pushed back toward the darkness ahead. Not far ahead, the cero exploded and a loud roar could be heard. Followed by many more roars and the sudden spiritual pressure of many high level hollows.

Suddenly an army of hollows could be seen around a mile ahead. The spiritual pressure of the many hollows seemed to weigh heavily on the weaker side of my squad. Kira was one of the many who stood their ground. Yet he still had a very scared look on his face.
111.title: Out of the Seireitei and into the fire

1111.content:
There was a very pale man in a white robe with purple vertical stripes. He had thin white half frames glasses frames and long purple fingernails. leading an army of adjuchas, Menos Grande, and huge hollows. The combined spiritual pressure of all the hollow brought most of my squad to their knees.

"Aw man. I'm really gonna have to use it in a place like this." Pure white aura surrounded Ryan as he raised his spiritual pressure. The sudden rise brought the rest of the squad to their knees. The rise also seemed to slightly phase the hollows as they started coming faster.

Purify...ALASTOR!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1111.title: Beginning of the fight

11111.content:
The sudden rise of my own spiritual pressure combined with the already high spiritual pressure of the hollow army brought my entire squad to the floor. With my glowing white zampacto in hand, i used shunpo to get to the front lines. Again i used shunpo to get to a Menos Grande's mask. Stabbing downward into the mask. The Menos disappeared faster than i expected. I had just enough time to use the remnants of the mask as a support for my next shunpo. I then cut deep into the side of a Gillian. My speed and spiritual pressure increasing with each kill, my movements becoming faster. After each hollow died, two more took its place. The light from my zampacto zipping from every corner of the army.

The leaders eyes followed me as i gained speed. He would look at me for awhile, then he would write something down on his clipboard. Finally i had enough. I jumped off the Menos' mask to get high above the hollow army. I began charging Shining Light. The surrounding area became a bright blue, lighting the entire hall. I was then hit in the back by a weak cero. The cero caused me to lose my focus and distorted the spirit particles i had gathered. Many other ceros came towards me. The blinding light forced me to close my eyes. I could then feel the force and searing pain of the ceros.
11111.title: Pure Spiritual Power

111111.content:
I could feel all the ceros hitting me, launching me into the ceiling. I could feel my numb body slowly slipping from inside the hole I created. As I felt life slipping away."Damn..." I said in my mind."I can't be killed by these weaklings. Well I guess it's time" I roared at the top of my lungs. I gathered a few spirit particles around my feet. I blasted out of the hole with a nicely powered shunpo.

My once white spiritual pressure turned red. My once blue eyes turned a bright yellow as my hollow mask began to appear. Alastor pulsated with energy and excitement as we neared the hollow horde. Then Alastor Turned into Bankai without any command from Ryan. I closed my eyes and concentrated to help boost the hollow mask. Then I found I was in my inner world. I was in an empty, light blue warehouse and my sword's soul Alastor appeared before me. He looked rather skinny and wore ancient samurai armor with blue pads and under cloth. he stood there with his arms crossed and an angry look on his face."You can't just blast off into battle Ryan. Full power is not always needed." his voice boomed."I needed to act quickly. Now please let me go back and save my men."I pleaded."Very well. Just don't make me bring you back here or i'll let the hollow out."My vision returned just in time as i was very close to the hollow.

I landed on my feet on a Menos Grande's mask, digging my blade in deep. i jumped up as the Menos began to disintegrate, looking back down at the hollows. Many of the adjuchas and weaker hollows were jumping and flying towards me. My mask now fully appeared gave me a boost in my speed. I focused some spiritual energy at the bottom of my feet and use that to launch me at the incoming hollows. I charged my shining light with as much spiritual energy i could cram into a few seconds. I shot it seconds before i collided with the a flying hollow. With a bright light all the flying hollows were destroyed and the tallest Menos were killed too.

After landing Ryan slashed at the adjuchas and smaller weaker hollow freeing up what little spiritual pressure to save his men. The leader still stood in the same spot, watching me purify his hollow soldiers. His clipboard in one hand and pen in the other still writing things on the paper. In the midst of combat I attempted to get closer but was intercepted by a much larger human-looking hollow with a zampacto and a broken mask. The remainder of his mask was only along his jaw line.I could tell he was too strong for me. He brought his blade down to chop me. I blocked his attack with my own sword. As he pushed down on my blade I tilted mine counter clockwise, forcing his into the ground to my left, and causing the ground to distort and create a crater. i quickly used shunpo to get away from this hollow brute, landing me once again in front of the, now smaller, hollow army.

Throughout the fight the surrounding spiritual pressure began to even out, letting some of my squad get to their feet. One of the first to get up was Kira. He watched his new captain destroying the hollows. None of the squad members ever thought the captain was a Vizard. After Ryan manged to shunpo close enough to the squad, they stood there both scared and amazed."I cant take all of the hollows alone. Now we need to..."he was cut off by one of his men."Why didn't you tell us you were a Vizard. I thought we shared trust throughout the squad."the soldier asked nervously."No one ever asked, so the need to say it never came up. But now is not the time for this, we need to close them in."
111111.title: Reawakening

1111111.content:
"Now, seats 100 up are gonna shunpo and hit the rear." I ordered. I had my back to the enemy. The bigger hollow man must have took this as an insult i guessed as i could here him angrily yell "RUSH THEM! KILL THAT BASTARD!" I turned to the hollow crowd then said "Way of Binding Number 81: Severing Void." An almost clear white barrier appeared before the hollows, bouncing them away as they tried to attack. "NOW SECOND GROUP, ATTACK!!!"



Then i could feel a different spiritual pressure toward the entrance to the real world on the far side of the dark halls. It seemed to match that of a captain. Yet there were none in the real world at the moment. This new spiritual power caused the walls of the dark hall to distort.
1111111.title: Rallying Cry

11111111.content:
As the walls began to distort, they gave off a purple glow. Both the shinigami and the hollow knew what this meant. As the walls pulsated with this purple light, yellow beams of light came down at random parts of the hollow horde. Then hollows could be seen flying up them. The second battalion ,which was supposed to attack, had pulled back, ending up behind the first battalion. As more light shown across the hollows, the more of my squad pulled back. Some of the beams began to shatter, killing the hollows inside. I stood in the middle of the confusion, dumbstruck. I had never seen anything like this happen before.

As more of the hollows rose and more shinnigami fled I managed to get a look at this mysterious helpers back. I could tell he was a shinnigami from the black zampacto he held. After more and more hollows died and my entire squad had gone there was only the sound of explosions as his blade crashed through the barriers of the hollows. It was amazing how fast he moved and how quickly his blade sliced through hollows. I was snapped out of my trance when a stray rock hit me on the head. Then i realized the walls had begun to crumble.

After the hollows were gone There was an awkward silence. The walls had momentarily stopped their crumbling but left a slight grey fog across the ground. Suddenly there was a rumble at the soul society end of the dark hall. The walls began crumbling again. blocking my way home. Suddenly i was grabbed by the back of my collar and dragged across the floor at an amazing speed. "Is the mysterious helper saving my life, or bringing me to my death?" My mind pondered. As i looked to see the face of this man there was a blinding light.
11111111.title: Unexpected Help

111111111.content:
I awoke with a start. I was lying on a floor bed in some kind of house by the looks of it. I felt cold. Thats when i realized both my kimono, and my haori had been removed. I also realized i had been cut across my side and that there were bandages covering it up. After standing up I found my zampacto wasn't in the room at all. "Weird' I said aloud as i walked over to my kimono. As i finished sliding my arms through the holes I felt a grim presence outside of the door. I quickly jumped to my haori, grabbing it as i rolled across the floor. I used the wall as support as i readied my hands to fire my kidou. The door slowly slid open to reveal a boy around 16 years of age, with yellow hair. He was dressed in the normal shinnigami kimono and i could just barely see the hilt of his blade over his back. "Who are you" I demanded. "Ichigo, Ichigo Kurosaki. I'm the substitute shinnigami." He responded. I slowly lowered my hands and rose from the floor. "Are you the one from the garganta?" i asked. "Yea I'm the one who saved your ass." He said smiling. "Don't get too excited berry, that was the first and last time you will have to save me." I said getting to my feet. "Hey" He yelled "don't call me that. You should be grateful i was there to save you." I chuckled after he finished yelling. "So where is my katana." I asked. "First you tell me your name" Ichigo Replied. "I am the third squad captain Ryan Akechi." I replied. "Now where is my Zanpakuto" I asked eagerly. "Urahara has it" He responded pointing out the door. I walked out the door and put my haori on as I walked down a long empty hallway. Rounding the corner, my face was met with something blue. Taking a step back I realized it was an apron. Looking up it was a large man staring down at me. His weird mustache twirled beyond his cheeks and his black tinted glasses gleamed from the sun light behind me made him look extremely weird. He began getting closer to me as if to get a better look. I silently leaned back until my back hit the bamboo frame of the window behind me. A stare down ensued.

Suddenly a skinny, white hand came over the large man's shoulder. Then came a green and white striped hat followed by the voice of the man under it. "Tessai, you'll scare him off like that" He said. Tessai slowly backed away to reveal a smaller man behind him wearing an open, green coat, and loud wood sandals. "I'm Urahara" he said proudly "and already know what your first question may be. Your sword is in that black box over there" He pointed over across the room. I slowly walked over toward the box only to realize there was a lock on it. I turned to Urahara, who had a small fan over his face. "you'll have to work for it" He said trying to supress a laugh. Angrily I turned to the box and shot a weak lightning kidou at the lock. The lock absorbed the lightning and glowed for a few seconds before it settled. Looking back at Urahara, he said "That lock absorbs kidou and strengthens itself." I looked at the ceiling "So this is what Rukia warned me about" I thought
111111111.title: Waking Moments

choices: Alex's first day of Karakura Highschool
112.content:
Okay say hello to a hero from another country. Alex Ningeki! Rumored to be the son of a arrancar and a soul reaper. He has yet to discover his powers and relize his destiny.

Okay now for the bio

Name: Alex Ningeki (Duh)

Power: Human. Hidden Soul reaper and arrancar

Appearance: He look a lot like Ichigo but instead of brown eyes he has Blue eyes. He wears a white T-shirt and black jeans. He always cares his lucky necklace which carrys a skull symbol (Like that on Rukia's soul glove thing.).

Backstory: Before arriving in Karakura Orihime and Him used to chat via mail due to he never owned a computor so he is excited to see Orihime in person. (Wait til he does heheh^_^)

Zanpakto: Name Sin/Saint
Shikai
Realease command: Judgement!
Apearence: Depending on his advesary's soul, it can be 1 of 2 forms.
1. If he/she soul's majority is good. It will morph into a blade similair to rukia's zanpakto but hab a keychain attached to the bottom with angel wings. In this mode when it cuts the opponet it purifies sum of it's soul and when i defeate them their soul is purified and sent to the soul society.
2.If he/she soul is pure evil the blade shal become big like ichigo's and take the shape of a giant meat cleaver. When this blade strikes the opponet shearing pain shall enter the wound causing the being to cry out in pain. When it defeats a opponet in this form, it swallows the soal and glows with a red aura like that of a hollow's red eye's.
If the release command is not uttered it looks just like a regular zanpakto except the blade is a mix between white and black Black being the majority due to so many evil soul's absorbed.
Bankai
Realse command: Awaken (Sin/Saint depending on shikai form)
Appearance
Good: The sword remains the same. Alex's clothes become like that of a captain's uniform thow all white and his shows are regular human feet. He also sprouts a pair of Agelic wings from his back
Evil: The sword splits into two of the same blades but are the same size of Ichigo's Zangetsu. Alex morphs like that of a hollow, his body becomes black and surrounded by white ribs, his legs morph into demon legs that are the color of blood,his feet become razor sharp claw-feet with nails the same color as blood. His hands remain human thow his nails grow a bit into dagger like shape and are black. And just like above he sprouts a pare of wings but instead of Angel wings the wings are black devil like wings.
Powers
Good: 1.Protect my friends: A wall of holy light surrounds Alex and his allies and cannot be pierced no matter what the attack. Note: this move can be activated when in shikai form thow coasts alot more spiritual energy.
2.Save their soul: Alex's body is bathed in a holy white light as his speed is increased to that of 5 fold his original. The opponets chest opens up to reveal their soul which Alex gently grasps in his hand and crushes it turning it into a white hell butterfly and lets it go.
Evil: 1.Blood of the tainted shall be shed (In short:Slay my enemy): Alex's eyes glow red and so do his blades. Alex begins to laugh manicly and flash steps at his enemy before slicing them in the back severing a arm in the prossec if unlucky enough. He contiues this until his second abillity activates.
2.Devour Sins: Like #2 from the Good mode the opponets chest opens up but instead of thier soul it reaveals a black heart. Alex walks up to the victim as the are paralised by his abillity(This is the same as the above 2 tho with less force used). Alex grabs their black heart and crushes it inside thier body. Thier whole body soul and all are then turned into a red orb and absorbed by Alex's blade.
Warning: To all who are Alex's commrads or friends, avoid contact with Alex when he is in his evil mode. He will do anything to destroy his enemy even if it means breaking threw the barrier between worlds. One person has the abillity to calm him in this state but the person who did it is curently unknown. We shall look into this matter and inform you more as we learn more information about this matter.

Alright now doesn't this sound like a interesting character to play as? Now let's begin.
112.title: Enter Alex Ningeki

choices: The go make sure he is okay
1121.content:
Alex had arrived at the school grounds to see the bell had rung "Oh no i'm late on my first day crap!" Alex ran inside and found his class room, it was the same as the rest of the main cast so he would meet them eventually. The teacher began role call as she called out a few names followed by the students to reply with here "Ichigo Kurosaki?" "Here" replied a tall teenager that looked almost exactly like Alex except for his brown eyes "wow he looks just like me" Alex thought as Ichigo sat down. "Uryu Ishida" the teaqcher called. "Here" replied a teenager with blue hair and glasses who was almost the same height as Ichigo just by .2 inches. "Hm he seams like the type who enjoys peace and quiet. Hmm maybe we can become friends"Alex asked himself. "Orihime Inoue" called the teacher and Alex dropped his jaw in suprise "Orihime Inoue! Orihime my old pen pale! I'm in the same class as her" Alex looked around and saw as Orihime stood up. She looked so beatiful and cute with her long orange hair and her blue snowflakes hair clips "Here" she replied with a voice to Alex atleast sounded like a angel. Alex blushed as he addmited he had grown a small crush on her from the letters she had sent him describing herself but nothing beats the real thing eh? "Alex Ningeki" called the teachera snapping Alex out of his daze. "Here Miss" Alex replied. "Oh i see your here well please come up here and tell us about yourself" with that Alex gulped as he felt a bit embareced but did as he was told and walked to the front of the classroom.
"Hello my name is Alex Ningeki and i come from a far off place around America." "Oh so you are from america i hear that place is great to vistit in the summer" replies the teacher. "Well yah i guess it is" Alex chuckle and so did Orihime a little bit. As Alex contiued someone in the back asked a question about him "Uh excuse me Alex i was wondering? Erm..." "Yes Chad contiue" replied the teacher. "Ah yes you'd like to ask what the last name Ningeki means i want to know as well" inturpted Uryu. "Yah me to" IChigo added. "I know" Orihime replied. "Alex bliushed a bit and she contiued "Ningeki in some cultures it means this. Nin: Protector Geki: (of the) weak, so Alex Ningeki means Defender and protector of the weak." "Wow Orihime you remebered" Alex said with a happy grin before a uproar of questions surrounded Alex and Orihime. "Hey how do you know Orihime" asks a red haired female student. "Yeah what else dfoes she know about you?" "How do you know her?" The questions flooded Alex's ears and mind "Hold on hold i'll answer them sjust back up" he said but no one heard hm over the comosion. Alex was backed up against the window by multiple students as they pushed their questions. Alex slipped and fell threw the window sending him plumiting three stories down and on his head.OW!
1121.title: School dazes...

11212.content:
A sudden explosion of power out of no where crushes Alex as if a boulder had just landed on him. His head was bleeding due to the fall but it was surprisingly only a minor bump that would heal in about a day. A blurry image covers Alex's vision as he notices something on him. He tries to knock it of with a few punches but it doesn't work when he suddenly hears a voice "Hm it seams you can see me human. Well that means you either have immense spiritual pressure or are just really dam unlucky. Either way too bad for you fool. A sudden glint of light hit Alex's face as it reflected of a blurry image of a sword. "Hey are you ok" asked a familiar voice? "Yeah fine thanks" Alex replies as the being gives him a hand up. Alex now standing takes a good look at his rescuer who now became as clear as day in his eyes "Wait a minute Ich...Ichigo! Wait you save me from that thing." "Yeah i did now you mind not making such a big fuss and getting back to class so no one becomes suspicious" Ichigo points towards your body that was laying down eye's closed and out cold. He also pointed out the chain attached to your chest and explained the whole chain of fate thing to you. Alex nodded and walked back to his body before a flash of dark red light enveloped him.
There standing before him beside his body was a black blade with a small amount of white on the cutting edge of the blade. Alex picked it up and in another flash of light he was now wearing robes similar to that of Ichigo's tho with one big difference his pants were just like that of his normal black jeans except they were red and he was barefoot. “Hey Alex are you ok” asked Ichigo? “Yeah I'm fine but what is this thing” Alex replied? “Alex what you hold there is called a Zanpakto. It's like what I have here altho yours is a lot smaller” Ichigo explains as he holds out his gigantic blade for an example. “Hm well that seams a little strange but anyway I guess I'll just get back into my body now” Alex slips into his body and then returns to class.
At the end of the day, Ichigo and the rest of the gang stop him as he was about to leave the school. “Hey Alex wait” Alex turns around at Orihime's call to see Ichigo, Uryu,Chad, and Orihime all walking towards him. “Oh hey guys whats up” Alex waves and slips on a smile. “Hey Alex are you ok” asks Ichigo? “Never better why do you ask” Alex replies. “Well its just the whole fact about that odd Zanpakto you were holding when you tried to return to your body. I've never see one like that before and I just got a strange feeling about it” says Ichigo. “Well I don't really think anything of it as long as it won't happen again. Right?” Alex gives Ichigo a questionable eyebrow raise before a female's voice came from behind him “If you want to know more about it you should talk to me.” What felt like she popped out of thin air was actual just a flip over a nearby wall and Alex didn't notice her til she spoke up. “Oh hey Rukia what up” Orihime yells in a cheer. “Rukia? So you must be the black haired heroin I've heard so much about” Alex bows as a good gesture to Rukia as he remembered Orihime said in one her letters that Rukia had come from a noble family. Rukia bows and then continues “Alex Ningeki I heard from Orihime you'd be arriving. I wanted to meet the guy who she addmires so mu” “Rukia no don't tell him that” Orihime covers Rukia's mouth telling her to shush before she objects to the statement. “Anyway” Rukia removes Orihime's hand and continues “From what I over heard you somehow posses powers like that of Ichigo's.” Rukia puts on her soul glove and readies to rip out Alex's soul but before she can do that Alex's necklace reacts emitting a flash of bright light before transforming Alex into a state similar to that of his earlier encounter with the Hollow except this time he was wearing the traditional shikigami outfit along with a blade strapped to his left side. “What the? What happened to me” Alex screamed in a moment of panic? “Hey Alex calm down it's okay” Orihime gives Alex a small but joyful hug and Alex calms down.
11212.title: Soul Reaper Alex

choices: More time with Orihime and more about Alex's past...
Time for the rendezvous already? What?
112121.content:
Orihime lets go of Alex and Alex smiles “Anyway let's talk somewhere more private maybe” “Let's all go to Ichigo's house” Alex yells interrupting Rukia's sentence and Orihime cheers.”Wait! Why my house? And why not your place” yells Ichigo with a bit of anger in his voice. “Well 1. Orihime says your place is the best to have meetings and 2. I don't have a place for us to go to” Alex explains and everyone nods in agreement, everyone except Ichigo that is. “Er... Fine we'll all meet at my place in an hour so don't be late” Ichigo says before walking off towards his house. “Alright we'll meet at Ichigo's in a hour. Alex I recommend staying with someone until we can figure out a way to turn you back” Rukia says pointing a finger at the remaining three. Uryu and Chad quickly step aside leaving Orihime to be left.”Huh oh ok I keep Alex company until the rendezvous” with that Orihime grabs Alex's hand and the two speed off towards her house leaving Rukia, Chad, and Uryu in a giant dust cloud.
Four Minutes later at Orihime's house...
As the two arrive at the house Orihime notices Alex unconscious, she turns around letting go of his hand and shakes him awake. Alex wakes up a minute later and they both go inside. “ Wow Orihime! This is your house” Alex was amazed as when he talked to Orihime via letters she never told him about her house. It was about as what you can expect a normal house could be but she had picture of various people all along the walls to the up stairs. Upstairs there was just a living room area and a kitchen but Alex didn't mind. He took a seat at the small table in the center of the room and Orihime brings him a glass of ice cold lemonade. “Thank you Orihime” Alex says as she hands him a glass before she herself pours herself a glass and sits down. “So how was the trip here” asked Orihime? “Ah pretty good at least I didn't have to use the alternative way” Alex replied remembering the alternative way here. Bio: Justin works hard but is taken advantage of by the higher-ups due to his reputation as a pushover. Is underappreciated but determined to rise up to the ranks and one day be the greatest Soul Reaper ever. Yeah, like that'll happen. While Justin mostly works as a lowly custodian, he has his own Zanpaku-tō and is often forced into tasks others do not wish to complete. Whether or not you choose him decides if he will spend the rest of his life working like a pack mule or become a heroic figure that has his scorners bowing to him.

Adonis Charlemagne IV got his name not only from his endlesslly flowing silver tresses but because he is totally hip with the ladies. The 'Shing-Shing' part comes from the noise he makes when removed from the sheath. It is no different than any other sword, by the way. He is incredibly flamboyant, his favorite thing is himself and he bosses Justin around just like everybody else.

You wake up to the bright sunlight that pierces through the window. Oh look, you fell asleep leaning on the mop again. It also appears that someone has given you yet another magic marker mustache that you squeedgee off with detest. One day, you know you will be a hero and then all your scorners will bow down to- Ah, but that is just a distant memory. You sigh and continue your dull life as the Soul Society's one and only janitor.

You look at your daily list of tasks that must be completed before sunset. You must wash all the dishes, scrub the hallways and windows, repaint this, fabricate that... It takes you twenty minutes just to finish unrolling the scroll of chores. Well, you have an entire twenty-four hours at least. Where do you begin?

You sigh, picking up your mop and move on. Thus is life.

It's Ryan Akechi, the new captain of Division 8. He still looks tired and headachey from his sake party last night. He freezes when he sees you holding the paper.

"Oh no..." he stammers, looking horrified. "You... didn't read it, did you?"

"She's pretty. I wish she'd talk to me," Adonis mutters but you're the only one who can hear him so that's not going to work out. "If I were you, your life would be way more exciting, my loser-tastic friend."

141211.title: Shout, "Wait! Don't bring out that cake...

choices: "Let me look in my pockets! Maybe I have something that will make it up to you!"
1412111.content:
"I... Well, I ate a piece of it..." you answer sheepishly.

One of the cake carriers bursts into tears and the other has a disgruntled look on her face.

"How could you?!" the first one sobs. "Do you know how long that cake took us?! It was for Shigekuni Yamamoto-Genryūsai! What is wrong with you?!"

"Wow, man... That's just... Wow..." The second one ends her thought with a disapproving shake of the head.

Even you are getting nervous. Shigekuni Yamamoto-Genryūsai?! Captain of the first division?! You'll get chewed out something awful if he finds out what happened! You might even lose your job! Which would be a very 'oh noes' of a situation!
1412111.title: Admit to your sin and keep your conscious clean.

choices: "ME! That's right, me! Nobody would suspect me, but I did it, me, me, ME!"
1412112.content:
"Poisoned?!" the male shrieks, sniffing his cake in distress, as if this will help the situation.

"Y-Yes," you manage to lie; they don't notice that you're choking as your conscience throttles you. You quickly wipe the chocolate off your face with your sleeve; thankfully they don't seem to notice.

"Who would've poisoned the cake?" the women asks.
1412112.title: Lying Through Your Chocolate-Covered Teeth

choices: Turn yourself in and cleanse your conscience.
Run and hide! You refuse to be found! Think of what they could do!
141212.content:
Relying on good fortune above all else, you let the cake go to whomever plans to eat it without the tiniest bit of regret. But you have reason to worry: that cake was going to be fed to the head honcho Soul Reaper: Shigekuni Yamamoto-Genryūsai himself!

Well, crud buckets. Did you think he'll be able to pass up something as miniscule as that? Obviously not. An announcement goes over the seemingly invisible intercom system a few moments later: "Anyone who has been in the kitchens in the past half hour please report to the main building IMMEDIATELY." The voice is curt and clipped. It means business.

You are totally shaking in your shoes! This is so not chill! If you go there, you'll definitely be caught! If you don't go there, you might be caught and, if you are, beat across the head! Maybe! Probably! Your imagination is running wild with the situation you've put yourself in. All you wanted was a piece of cake; isn't that innocent enough?
141212.title: Clearly not a germaphobe, are you?

14122.content:
Bah! Temptation has nothing on you. You ignore your grumbling stomach and finish the dishwashing. It's a good thing you decided not to eat any, because two people come in and take the cake away. If that was going to someone important, you sure would be in a whole bunch of trouble.

The dishes are complete! Now what?
14122.title: The Goodie-Two-Shoes Option Saves the Day

choices: put up some orange traffic cones that will direct traffic to places to walk.
yell at everyone, "I'm trying to clean here!!!"
141221.content:
La~ La~ La~ You wash the floor happily. There sure are a lot of floors, though. You wish you didn't have to wash them all by yourself.

It wouldn't be quite so hard, though, if every time you mopped a certain area, someone stepped on it in their dirty shoes. The mud mixes with the water and gives the tiles a brownish sheen. This upsets you to no end, so you -
141221.title: Finish washing the floors!

You enter with your bag-o-cleansing stuff and put everything in its usual place. As you're dusting, a stray piece of paper with the words 'URGENT' on top in capitalized red letters catches your eye. It is kind of suspicious. Dare you let your curiousity get away with you?

You pick up the piece of paper and unfold it carefully. The slightest rustle of noise makes you nervous that someone could be watching. You figure out that it is a message to a fellow Soul Reaper named Royce Williams. You know that guy. He's tripped you at least once or twice when you were simply walking along. The nerve.

You read the ink letters on the parchment carefully:

"Royce-

Do not let this message fall into the hands of anyone other than Kyōraku and ourselves. It would be of dire circumstances if anyone else was to find it. I'm dead serious. And yes, I said DEAD SERIOUS, Royce, so no getting drunk and telling your lady friends about this to impress them."

You laugh under your breath. This is getting good! Do you dare keep reading?
1412221.title: Mwa, ha, ha! Of course I do!

Alas-! two people come in and notice the cake is gone. With you covered head to toe in brown frosting, hey, it looks pretty suspicious.

How will you become a Soul Reaper at this rate...?

Where do you look first?

Attempting to attack him would, at the best, land you in prison, bound and gagged, with land mines surrounding the area, and a ticking noise coming from nowhere that drives you to insanity and never allows you to sleep.

141311.content:
You walk down a different corridor, feeling a bit glum that you can be picked on so easily. In the middle of your self-reprimanding, something crinkles underfoot. You pull back (a piece of garbage, perhaps?) and see a piece of paper. Before you read what may be written on it, someone runs up to you. You recognize them to be Ryan Akechi, the new captain of Squad 8. Boy, does he look horrified to see you are in possession of that paper. He also looks like he just spent the entirety of last night drinking sake but you ignore that.

"Hey, uh... Frank," he begins.

"It's Justin," you correct.

"Justin, of course," Akechi says, and continues in a desperate tone, "Listen, I'll really be needing that paper back. You didn't read it, did you?"
141311.title: Turn on your heal and walk away before you appe...

choices: Smile and with a say slyly, "So what if I do tell people about... that?"

He takes it back with a snap of his wrist.

"Thank you," he snarls as he folds it neatly and places it back in his pocket. "Promise me you didn't read it then. It would be... unfortunate for such matters to be divulged. Don't you agree?" He fingers at his sword handle theateningly. You gulp, getting the message, but know you have nothing to tell anyone anyway. But...
1413111.title: It's here YOU go, dude. Duh.

choices: "No, I didn't... You can have it back, I suppose."

Ryan Akechi, who's actually captain of Squad 3, silly you, looks at you with an expression nearing aggravation.

"Because," he continues through gritted teeth, "the things written on there are confidential - that means my eyes only. You can't tell anyone what's written there. But you didn't read it, did you? Please tell me you didn't."
1413112.title: Why it matters if you did

141312.content:
"What the-?!" You're lucky his first reaction isn't to kill you, like it would be with other Soul Reapers. He rips you off his head and says, "What are you doing, Justin? Are you mad because I gave you a mustache again?" Then he and the others have a good chuckle. You feel kind of ridiculous.

Unfortunately, for harrassment of a being higher in society, you are fired! That's right, fired! You'd better look before you leap next time! Too bad there is no next time in becoming a Soul Reaper. Your dreams are shattered...
141312.title: Monkey Ninjas, Attack!

141321.title: Grab the pen as evidence and then find him to i...

Kyōraku turns when he hears his name called.

"Hey, Kevin!" he waves in greeting.

"It's Justin," you snarl. People never do remember your name. "How dare you draw another magic marker mustache on me! I was asleep! Do you know who keeps this place clean? Me! I do! And it's hard enough for me to accomplish things without your antics!"

"Sorry," Kyōraku apologizes insincerely.

Not sure that he understands who serious you're being, you-
1413211.title: Shout, "Hey, Kyoraku-[Japanese suffix]!"...

Glaring a Kyōraku doesn't seem to work until you begin to grunt. After about twenty minutes of this display, he looks down at you.

"Hey, Jasper!" he greets.

"Justin," you reply. "Stop drawing a mustache on my me while I'm asleep!"

"But it's so much fun..." Kyōraku says. "Okay, okay. I'll try not to take advantage of you. But if you fall asleep in the hallway again, you're fair game."

Well, now you've got that settled.
1413212.title: Stomp up and glare at him until he notices you.

choices: Leave it alone. You don't want to snoop.
141322.content:
You clean up Kyōraku's room just the way he likes it, killing the tension between you two. In fact, at this point, you've memorized just how each particular Reaper likes their rooms organized. Potted plant in the corner, bed aligned with the window sill... They're very precise instructions but you're so used to it at this point that you no longer believe that Kyōraku might just be messing with you and doesn't actually want his room so neat.

Just when things seem as normal as possible, you see a parcel in the center of the floor. It says in a hasty scrawl "Well, here you go. ~Akechi." Ryan Akechi? You feel like he's someone important. Oh yeah, the new captain of Squad 3. That guy that kind of looked like Tousen. He was indeed important.

The box is a rather suspicious-looking thing that peaks your curiosity. How long has it been since something interesting has happened to you? Too long? Clearly, because the prospect of whatever is inside the cardboard container is making you sweaty with excitement.

The birds eat merrily out of your hand, enjoying the free meal that could have been your breakfast. Oh well. Their happy twitters fill yours ears and inside you feel a bit more complete.

Suddenly, the birds scatter as a shadow comes over them. It is a piece of paper and it falls directly into your lap. You tsk at the uncleanliness of some individual and pick it up to toss away. But suddenly, the new captain of Squad 8, Ryan Akechi, races through the doorway.

"Oh, hey... uh, Martin?" he begins.

"Justin, close enough," you say. They both end with 'in' at least.

"Yeah," Akechi pants; it seems as if he has run quickly to come down here. "That piece of paper... You didn't read it did you?"

You've always kind of hated her, because even though she's younger than you are, she has such a high position in the Soul Society. She probably knows that you despise her so, because when she isn't clinging to Zaraki, she's attacking you and reminding you of your janitor status.

1521.content:
Draco looked up at the cresent moon overhead that lit the desert landscape before him, it cast a dim light across the landscape illuminating the new massive structure in the distance. But that wasn't Draco's concern, his concern was with the hollow that was even now fleeing him. Draco gave chase his long gold hair flowing in the wind as he ran after his prey.

The hollow noticed that Draco was chasing it again and began to run faster, it had no intention of letting Draco eat it. Draco thought nothing new of this, this was how he lived in his home of in Hueco Mundo, eat hollows or starve. His mother had strongly disapproaved of this method of survival but his father had told him it was the only way to get stronger and survive. Draco had to agree with his father on that one.

In this harsh unforgiving world it was eat or be eaten, even Draco understood that.

Then the hollow did something Draco had never seen one do before, it opened up a shadowy portal and leapt through. Draco wasn't about to let the hollow get away and put on an extra burst of speed to leap through the portal before it closed. Draco felt a bit of vertigo as he tumbled through the void but spotted the hollow again and leapt towards it grabbing hold of it just as it slid through another portal.

Draco fell into a bright unfamilier landscape clutching the hollow he'd caught as it thrashed and roared. Draco took his blade and plunged it into the hollow's head killing it and allowing Draco to consume it. Draco felt he should eat before investagating this strange landscape.

Draco wipped the hollow's green blood from his mouth enjoying the rush it gave him always feeling just a tad stronger than before. Looking around at the many block-like objects Draco noticed two figures darting towards him and quickly fled behind one of the strange nearby trees. Draco didn't know just how strong or dangerous anything or anyone was here so took the caution of lowering his reiatsu as much as he could, even removing his mask.

Draco cautiously peered around the corner of the tree he was behind watching as two figures drew closer and finally landed next to his kill. Draco could feel each of them was at least as powerful as his father, but they both carried Zampacto wereing clothing similar to his mother's. Wondering if they might actually be Soul Reaper Draco inspected both closely trying to listen in on any conversation they might have.

Draco quickly noticed that the one on the left with spikey orange hair had had a huge Zampacto, bigger than any Draco had previously seen. He also had an air about him that seemed strangely familier to Draco, but Draco couldn't put his finger on it. Draco was sure that in a fight he would be the toughest of the two to bring down.

The second was much smaller in both stature and blade size with smooth hair as dark as the sky of his home land. While she was obviously weaker of the two she was studying the hollow he'd killed with much greater intensity and care. This left Draco to conclude she was easily the smarter of the two and he should be careful around her.

Both suddenly stood up after examining the hollow and the big one asked, "Rukia, what happened to it?"

"It looks alomst like it was eaten by another hollow," the smaller one said looking at a small device in her hand, "But it's odd, the scanner didn't pick up any other signs of a hollow."

"Yeah but I did feel another reiatsu briefly before arriving," the taller figure said, "Whoever it was might still be around here somewhere."

Draco quickly pulled his head back behind the tree hoping not to be spotted out of his element listening as Rukia said, "Ichigo, don't do anything stupid, we need to get back to the other before anyone realizes we're gone."

"Yeah I know," Ichigo said.

Draco quietly sighed just as...
15211.title: Strangers

choices: a blond man wearin a striped hat
A young girl  with neck length black hair
152111.content:
"Who the heck are you?" Ichigo asked suddenly appearing directly in front of Draco.

Draco gulped as he felt sweat quickly running down his face and did the first thing that came to mind, he ran for all he was worth.

"Hey come back here!" Ichigo shouted giving chase.

"Ichigo!" Rukia called following suit.

Draco could feel himself starting to panic as he ran, he was lost in a new a strange land and already had two of the locals after him. Draco decided to try and hide among the many stone structures that the two Soul Reapers had come from in hopes of losing them jumping off a ledge to save time. Only to notice in midair that the paths between the structures were flooded with more of the strange maskless inhabitants of this world.

Draco crashed into the ground and tried to run without being spotted just to notice that aside from the two chasing him almost nobody seemed to even notice he was there. Draco paused and waved his hands in front of some of the inhabitants eyes to see if they reacted but they didn't. Before Draco could investage further he heard Ichigo shout, "Hey you wait up!"

Draco felt some of his hairs stand on end as he resumed running as fast as he could heading for something he recoginzed, water. Draco dove in and swam quickly upstream and hid under a large structure spanning the river gasping for breath and pausing for a break.

After mere seconds he heard Ichigo say, "Damn I lost him, any idea who that was Rukia?"

"No I've never seen him before in my life," Rukia said, "Strange that a fellow Soul Reaper would run from us though."

Draco bristled at being called a Soul Reaper but remained quiet and hidden.

"Oh well," Ichigo said, "I we see him again we'll just have to ask. Come on the others are probably starting to worry about us by now."

Draco heard the two leaving but continued to to hold his breath for several seconds before sighing and sitting down. It had been a rough day so far for him, several hours of sitting bored among the dunes before having to hunt a weak little hollow and ending up in a strange world he'd never seen before. Not only that he'd had to remove his mask, something he hadn't done in years.

Draco looked at his reflection and was surprised by how much his face had changed since he had last seen it. His face no longer has any of its boyhood chubbyness, it was now a long lean face of a warrior unmarred by scars or any other blemishes. He felt his slightly pointed chin and distinctive cheekbones as well as his short long nose, all that paired with his glinting hazel eyes made him look damn good. If no one in this world wore a mask he might just stay like this.

Draco's thoughts were disturbed by the sound of footsteps coming to a stop behind him as he slowly looked to see...

"Hello there," the man said cheerily, "How nice to run across someone new on one of my daily strolls."

Draco nervously raised a hand and stammered, "Yes how nice," Draco smiled but felt extreamily nervous. This man might appear harmless but he had an amazing reiatsu that distingushed him from the many maskless inhabitants of this world.

"You look like this is your first time to being here in the human world," the man said, "You don't even have a gegi yet do you?"

"Then you'll simply have to do me a favor," the man said smiling.

"I'd be glad to," Draco said sweating a bit knowing he had no choice in the matter.

What was the favor?

Name: Eve Enzeru("Enzeru" is Japanese for "Angel")

Gender: Female

Species: Hollow(Can take the form of a human for a short period of time.)

Description(Human): Stands 6'1, with short silver hair that has a hint of pink in it. Bright amber eyes, is usually very expressive with her face. Has a decent chest(B-cup), waist, and hips. Wears a snow hat with a skull motif, along with normal clothes she steals finds. Finally, she has a spiked tail, kinda like a anklyosaur.
(Hollow Form): She still has her snow hat, but now has claws, Shark-like teeth, has a gray cape that can transform into wings, her spiked tail looks more deadly. Has super strength, and can regenerate small wounds in minutes(deeper ones take hours.) Finally, Eve gains fur that is the same color as her hair. That and the fact she gains a foot in height.(In case you can't tell what Eve is supposed to be, she's a chimera.)

Personality: Very kind; Kinda tomboyish.

Zampacto: A normal sword that looks more like a knife.

Power: Can manipulate her blood into either spikes, a blast, or even grow extra arms.

Shikai Release Phrase: "Roar, my blade!"

Shikai Form: Her sword grows larger, and gains serrated teeth around the blade.

Weaknesses: Although she's far from stupid, Eve is very kind-hearted. She will also do anything for her little brother, Max Noone(Read bio).

Bio: Originally Eve Noone, she lived a normal, everyday life, along with her brother Max, alone in a house after their parents death. That is, until a Hollow attacked both Eve and Max after middle school. She pushed her bro out of the way, and was rewarded with a stab to the gut. She passed out.

A year later, Eve wakes up and hears her brother crying in the graveyard some odd blocks away. When she got there, Max was crying near a grave that said "Here lies Eve Noone"

Confused, she turned to him and asked him what was wrong. Max, startled at the voice that seemingly came out of nowhere, looked beside him and was rewarded with a confused..... something looking at him. He screamed, before he ran away. Eve quickly followed, unsure about what Max screamed at. That is, until she looked at a mirror.

At first, she was scared, but after a few minutes, she got used to seeing her body like this(Wow, that's fast). She went to her house and knocked on the door, hoping that Max was here. He was, and after her telling him that she was not only her sister she also mentioned her mysterious year-long coma/transformation. Reluctantly, Max let the creature in. There, Max told Eve his tale; Not long after her death, he's been seeing spirits that no one else can see!

Seeing a connection, the duo teamed up to figure out both the mysterious "Soul Reapers" and what the creatures they are fighting are. Who knows, maybe they will find a few things about what happened to them!

So, do you want to choose this character?

15432.title: other character

154321.content:
The hollow looked down at minato,holding the bodies of his dead teammates in his hands.It was all minato could do to keep from crying.These were people who had lived with him,worked together with him.They were,are his nakama and he refused to go down without a fight.

Minato whirled towards the hollow,brandishing his sword.The hollow shrieked in insensate rage,angry that its feast had been interrupted by a small pest like the little shinigami.Minato used all the fighting skills he knew against the hollow,but the beast was simply too powerful.It had eaten minato's comrades and gained their overall power."You are being overmastered.You should have let me take over.I could have saved the lives of your friends,you foolish young mouse.It was all you that your comrades died.You are the cause.People like you should let people like me take over.It is only a matter of time before...."said the voice in his head.

"No! Shut up! Go away!!!I don't need you and I never will!!!!"screamed minato at the sky.He then succumbed to a dry coughing fit as the hollow closed in on him.Now that Minato could see it properly,the hollow was a monstrous specimen,towering above him.Though not as large as a Menos Grande,it was still too powerful for Minato to handle."I should have called for help"Minato thought."Now Iam dead.Gomene,Shinji-san,Aya-chan.Iam so sorry"he said as he closed his eyes.

The hollow howled in triumph as it advanced towards the cowering little shinigami.It was going to have an extra snack,and an especially tasty one at that.Suddenly,a cacophony of sound resounded within the hollow's mind,instantly stripping him of all strength and leaving it convulsing upon the ground.Minato's eyes had rolled up,and dark smoke was pouring from eyes,mouth and nose.The smoke glistened with malevolent intent as it wrapped itself around the hollow."Hmm,the hunter becomes the hunted.What exactly should I do with you,you stupid beast."said a voice within the smoke,as if it was commenting about the weather.

The hollow used all the essence it had collected from the dead shinigami he had eaten to escape from this black smoke but it was futile.A titanic force held him in place and it was impossible to even move an inch within the face of such power.The hollow resorted to shucking its skin,attempting to flee before the dark master within the smoke had noticed that it was gone."A foolish attempt.Die"said the voice.An incredible force liquidated the hollow into a fine goo and then completely disposed of what was left.

"Now what should I do with you Minato.As a zanpakuto,I was created to destroy,and yet you refuse to wield me,only letting me out when you are unconscious.Ah,he's waking up"the voice said as Minato woke up."Another time then"said the voice as the smoke receded into minato's body.Minato sat up with a start and looked around.No sign of the hollow was left,evoking a dread chill within Minato that hadn't happened in a long time.This was definitely the work of his blade,Shinihane.....
154321.title: Prologue

1543211.content:
Minato trudged wearily through the park at Sharugika road,far from any assistance from Soul Society.After his teammates had been slain and him being severely injured,there was no way he could get back to Soul Society without help."Oh,you know there is a way back to Soul Society.All you have to do is call out to me and give all that you are to...."said the voice in his head.

Minato ignored his zanpakuto,moving through the crowd wearily,his uniform tattered and torn at several places,blood creeping out fron several wounds,some requiring attention,and some not.If the humans could see him,they'd probably attempt to assist him and would probably get him to their hospital as soon as possible.But then again,being the ordinary humans they are,they wouldn't see him anyway.

Minato remembered the good times back when he was just a normal soul living in Soul Society.He had been terribly sick since way back then,but Shinji and Aya had always stood by his side,supporting him all the way.When they discovered they had potential as shinigami,they regretted leaving him to go for thier training,but had went nonetheless.When recently Minato was discovered to have spiritual potential,it had been the happiest moment of his life to be reunited with his friends.Now they were gone,and he was being plagued by black thoughts from his zanpakuto spirit.He could see Shinji now,urging him to lie down and rest."I can't Shinji-san,I'd die"thought Minato.

Then again,how painful would dying be?His former life was unknown to him,but his life in soul society was a constant battle against his sickness.How much would it hurt to just lie down now?All that it would take was to just close his eyes,lie down and rest...... .The entity within his head realized that he was slipping away and he knew that he could not let that happen,for he would die as well.It sighed,knowing that if it failed to rekindle it's master's survival instinct,that it would die as well.

Minato woke up in a strange dark place.Two hooded figures were helping him to the centre of the dark area,which was shrouded in a bright light.He looked into the faces of the hooded figures and realized that they were his friends.He smiled,knowing that he was going on to a better place.Suddenly,his friends were grabbed by a huge horned figure and crushed before his very eyes."NOOOOOOOOO!!!"screamed Minato.Not again,Never again!!!.He looked to the corpses of his friends,their lifeless heads(their bodies have been,ahem,crushed)staring blankly at him.

He looked to the horned figure with real hatred shining in his maroon eyes."You took everything away from me,again!!You demon"Minato screamed,looking at the huge entity with undisguised hatred."By letting go of your life,you have let me,your zanpakuto,into the world.I am free to do anything i want,and you cannot stop me"taunted the entity."No,I will not let that happen"Minato swore.Then,live Shirogaki Minato,Live......

Minato opened his eyes with a start.His body was still injured,but he somehow found the strength to use a kido spell to contact Soul society.He mentally thanked his zanpakuto,though begrudgingly,for helping him find the will to live.Somehow,he felt,his life was far from over...
1543211.title: Chapter 1:Darkness incarnate

Cero

Lighting manipulation-Can control lighting freely

Back Story-I was the loving big foster sister of Momo Hinamori after being found to have great dorment power I was enrolled in Shino Academy where I trained to become a soul reaper,after I completed my time there I was made the 3rd seat of Squad 7 under Sajin Komamura due to being sent on many missions to kill hollows I rarley saw Momo anymore,One day I was given a mission to investigate reports of a powerful hollow in the human world I took 6 other unseated soul reapers with me after arriving we were attacked by a arrancar the 6 unseated were killed instantly,I managed to hold out for a while until I was stabbed from behind by a unknown figure while I was bleeding out on the ground I felt the figure do something to me the arrancar and the figure leave as Captain Komamura and Lieutenant Iba arrive to save me but it's too late I can feel everything starting to blur,I can feel the Captain try to stop the bleeding while they both tell me to hold on but I can't everythings slipping away and I gave him my last words "Please Captain take care of..." I'm unable to finish and die, But I wake up in Hueco Mundo and wander for days on end getting used to my body until it's time to take a trip to the Soul Society or the human world

Zanpakuto: Kage Ryū (shadow dragon)
Shikai Release Phrase: suto wo jinsoku ni, Kage Ryū (Strike Swiftly Shadow Dragon)
Shikai form: Katana with Crimson blade and black guard and handle. Allows Shin to move at high speeds as well as create beasts from the shadows.
Bankai: Saikō no Kage Ryū,
Bankai Power: Shadows engulf Shin giving him the form of a Black Dragon with Blood one red eye and one green eye. While in this form Shin's speeds increase even more and he is able to shoot black flames from his mouth.
Zanpakuto Spirit: Black Humanoid Dragon with the Emerald Green eyes.

Bio: Good natured, always chasing down women. When performing his duties as a shinigami he becomes serious, almost cold hearted. 3rd seat of Second Division, Shin Katsuragi is known mostly for his strength in battle. However when off duty he chases down women, however the woman he most desires is his captain SoiFon. Shin is always working hard trying to gain the notice of SoiFon, but cannot help hitting on the various women in Soul Society.
15433.title: Shin Katsuragi

154331.content:
I made my way up to the temple that I have become so familiar with. As I walked up the now familiar steps I thought about the day I first came here. It had been 10 years ago when Captain SoiFon allowed me to journey to the world of the living in order to perfect my skills. During these 10 years I had trained both my mind and body, but nothing prepared me for what happened next. A shinigami that I didn't recognize appeared before me and told me that Captain Aizen of the 5th division had betrayed the Soul Society and had gone to Hueco Mundo along with Captains Ichimaru and Tousen. I was ordered to return to Soul Society at once and help restore balance.

Before leaving I went to see my master and when I saw him I said, "Master I thank you for teaching me all these years, but the time has come for me to leave you."
He just looked at me and said "heh, It was time for you to leave 2 years ago. You just stuck around to hone the skills that I have taught you...and to try and claim the heart of my granddaughter as well as the various women that visit the inner temple for priestess training."
I couldn't help but give what had become my trademark grin, but that quickly changed as I turned and left. Not far from the temple I ditched my gigai and began preparations for the journey back to Soul Society.
154331.title: Day in the life of Shin Katsuragi

1543311.content:
As I made my way through the senkaimon I wondered if Soul Society still looked the same, however my thoughts were interrupted as I came to the end of the gate. Waiting on the other side of the gate was Vice Captain Omaeda.
"Yo" I said waiting for a reaction, but he just kept staring at me until finally I got annoyed and said, "Hey fatty, cat got your tongue or something?"
That definitely got a rise out of him because he got in my face and yelled "What was that?! You better show some respect to your Vice Captain! Anyways you're needed on our squads practice ground."
I decided to stay quiet and head on over to the practice grounds. There I was faced with every Captain of the Gotei 13, minus the ones who had defected. Captain Soi Fon stepped forward and said, "3rd Seat Katsuragi, since you have been gone for so long it has been decided that you must be reevaluated so all the Captains are here to witness the event."
"Heh, so who's my opponent?" I said cockily
"Ahem, that would be me..."
I looked around everywhere for the mysterious voice that had spoken to me, but couldn't locate the person. "Hey, down here." Looking down I saw a black cat.
"You've got to be kidding me... I'm supposed to fight a...a cat?"
"This is a very serious matter Katsuragi and that is no Ordinary cat." Captain Soi Fon said.
"That's right." ...Another voice I didn't recognize, However as I turned towards it I was greeted with the site of a beautiful dark skinned woman and my jaw dropped.
"Well hello there, I'm Shin Katsuragi. I don't believe we've met."
Then Head Captain Yamamoto yelled, "Enough! This is an evaluation. 3rd seat Katsuragi your opponent is Yoruichi Shihoin!"


To Be Continued
1543311.title: Continue

info.brief_description: How would your life go if you were in Bleach after Aizen's Betrayal
info.description:
I do not own Bleach nor claim too.

Hopeful a successful interactive about Bleach. This is supposed to take place soon after Aizen's betrayal. Here you get to create your own Soul Reaper in one of the 13 protection squads, or Arrancar in a Fraccion, the Espada, or Privaron. Even be a Quincy or human.

Rules:
1.You must include details about your character including: Name, facial features, Zampacto name and release phrase if the time comes. It helps create a mental image.
2.Cursing is partially allowed. just don't over do it
3.If your going to add to someone else's storyline[which includes my own] ask for their permission to before adding.

Have fun
